channel.title: Weatherzone News
channel.description: Weatherzone - forecasts, satellite, BoM radar and more

item.title: Prime Minister and NSW Premier announce $1b funding for Wyangala, Dungowan dam projects
item.description: A billion-dollar package to upgrade or build new dams in drought-afflicted NSW regions is expected to put "bulldozers in the ground" next year, the Liberal-National coalition has said.

item.title: Array of weather for South Australia today
item.description: A large inland trough combined with a low-pressure system currently residing over the Great Australia Bight is resulting in a large array of weather today in South Australia.

item.title: Typhoon Hagibis hammers Japan
item.description: Typhoon Hagibis has now made landfall over Japan, bringing widespread flooding rainfall, destructive winds and huge ocean swell.

item.title: Ongoing drought, calicivirus decimate feral rabbit populations in Queensland's Southern Downs
item.description: Rabbit numbers in parts of Queensland are at their lowest levels in more than 30 years, with the drought, as well as ongoing eradication programs and viruses, helping to bring the population down.

item.title: Pony Club in Australia has been going for 80 years â€” but can it survive the drought?
item.description: This year, Pony Club celebrates its 80th year in Australia, but with the worst drought in 160 years and rising feed costs, horse ownership has become further out of reach than ever for its families.

item.title: Typhoon Hagabi looms over Japan
item.description: Japan braces itself as Typhoon Hagabi threatens heavy downpour and damaging winds.
